8.6.2.app_readme:
The modern download automation tool for torrents.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/autobrr

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
8.6.2.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

8.6.0.app_readme:
The modern download automation tool for torrents.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/autobrr

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
8.6.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

7.7.0.app_readme:
The modern download automation tool for torrents.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/autobrr

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
7.7.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project

7.5.0.app_readme:
The modern download automation tool for torrents.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/stable/autobrr

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
7.5.0.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
